plugins.name: Snable: Extract styles from web pages
plugins.description:
Snable Figma Plugin brings your web page data directly into Figma. It works exclusively in conjunction with the Snable Chrome Extension to deliver its full functionality.


Extract crucial web components like colors (more units soon) from any live webpage using the extension. Simply copy data from the extension and paste it into the plugin to kickstart your Figma designs with real web content.
plugins.tagline: Your fastest path to web styles

No more hunting through the page list. Just click and go!

plugins.name: Nexus
plugins.description:
Nexus is a Figma plugin designed to seamlessly sync content from Google Sheets while automatically updating text layers and their names.


Built for designers and product teams, Nexus eliminates manual copy-pasting by connecting your Figma files to a centralized content source. Select a language, pick the texts you need, and apply them in one click — layer names and content are updated instantly.


✅ Real-time sync with Google Sheets

✅ Automatic update of text layer content

✅ Structured layer renaming (#BODY.x, #CTA.x)

✅ Clean, intuitive interface for efficient workflows


Save time. Stay consistent. Focus on design.

Nexus handles the repetitive work — you focus on creating.
plugins.tagline: Power Your Workflow

plugins.name: BrowserLens
plugins.description:
This plugin lets you import color styles from the BrowserLens web extension. Insert colors as layers in your design and add palettes to your local styles.


Learn more about BrowserLens: https://browserlens.com/

Documentation: https://docs.browserlens.com/


How to Use

  1. Open any webpage with the BrowserLens extension.
  2. Click export > Figma (BrowserLens Plugin).
  3. Download the style file for Figma.
  4. Run this plugin and upload the style file.
  5. Choose whether to add colors as local styles.
  6. Click 'Import Styles'.


About BrowserLens


BrowserLens is a web extension designed to extract styling and seo information from any webpage without the need for developer tools. It provides a simple UI for extracting and copying webpage information from the current tab.


Extension Features

  1. ⌨️ View fonts used on a webpage and the associated CSS values.
  2. 🖌️ Extract colors from a webpage and click to copy color value.
  3. 🌅 Extract gradients from a webpage and click to copy CSS value.
  4. 🎨 Export color palettes to Figma.
  5. 🌐 Preview SEO data including page meta, OpenGraph tags and Twitter Card data.
  6. ✅ Check SEO meta for best practices including title and description length.
  7. 🖼️ List all images present on a page and click to download, including background images.
  8. 🌃 Dark mode support.

accepted.name: BrowserLens
accepted.description:
Extract colors, fonts, media and seo meta from any site without using developer tools. 

Available for Chrome, Firefox and Edge

plugins.tagline: Import styles from the BrowserLens web extension

plugins.name: Email Name Generator
plugins.description:
Easily generate realistic and culturally diverse names right inside Figma. NameGen Africa helps designers and developers populate mockups with random African and global names—perfect for UI/UX projects, user flows, and form demos.


Features:


Generate random names with authentic African and international options

Choose between first name only or first and last name (separated by a period: john.doe)

Select email type: corporate (e.g., john.doe@company.com) or personal (e.g., john.doe@gmail.com)


Instantly fill text fields or use in prototyping workflows


Perfect for creating inclusive and realistic user data with just a few clicks!

plugins.name: QQT Random Number Generator
plugins.description:
This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers. It supports both Chinese and English language interfaces, has a clear visual hierarchy, and is simple and intuitive to operate.

Functional Features

1. Range Setting: You can set the minimum and maximum values of the random numbers (e.g., 20 - 50).

2. Decimal Place Setting: You can set the number of digits after the decimal point.

3. Thousand Separator Display: You can choose whether to insert a thousand separator in the number.

4. Custom Prefix and Suffix: You can add custom prefixes and suffixes, such as +, -, %, HKD, ¥, etc.

5. Chinese - English Switch: It supports quick switching between Chinese and English interfaces.


这是一个Figma插件，用于将选中的文本替换为随机生成的数字。支持中英文双语界面，视觉层次分明，操作简单直观。

功能特点

1. 区间设定：可以设置随机数字的最小值和最大值（例如20～50）

2. 小数位设置：可以设置小数点后的位数

3. 千分位显示：可以选择是否在数字中插入千分位分隔符

4. 自定义前后缀：可以添加自定义前缀和后缀，如+、-、%、HKD、¥等

5. 中英文切换：支持中英文界面快速切换
plugins.tagline: This is a Figma plugin that replaces selected text with randomly generated numbers.

plugins.name: Long side scaling
plugins.description:
Tired of manually resizing images within frames one by one, especially when you need them to fit a specific maximum dimension while keeping their aspect ratio? "Long Side Scaling" automates this task!


What this plugin does:

  1. It finds the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill inside each selected Frame.
  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").
  4. It then proportionally resizes the image so that its longest side exactly matches the dimension you entered.


How to use:

  1. Select one or more Frames containing the images you want to resize.
  2. Run the "Long Side Scaling" plugin from the Plugins menu.
  3. The plugin window will show how many selected frames contain a suitable image.
  4. Enter the desired dimension (in pixels) for the longest side into the input field.
  5. Click the "Start" button.
  6. The images within the selected frames will be resized instantly!


Key Benefits:

  1. Batch Processing: Saves time by resizing images in multiple frames at once.
  2. Proportional Scaling: Guarantees your images won't be stretched or distorted.
  3. Consistent Sizing: Perfect for creating uniform image galleries, grids, or ensuring images don't exceed a maximum width or height.
  4. Simple Interface: Easy to use with just one input and one button.


Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
plugins.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

130386.name: Long side scaling
130386.description:

  2. It takes the dimension you provide (e.g., 1040px).
  3. It identifies whether the image's width or height is larger (the "longest side").

Important Note:

This plugin specifically targets the first visible Rectangle node with an Image fill it finds directly within each selected Frame. Images inside groups within the frame, or images applied as fills to shapes other than Rectangles, will not be affected.
130386.tagline: Scale images proportionally by their longest side.

plugins.name: Figma to osu!framework
plugins.description:
A third-party plugin to convert Figma elements to osu!framework code


Supported features:

  1. Basic layout (RelativeSizeAxes, Anchor/Orign, Padding, etc.)
  2. Converting cornerRadius to masking containers
  3. Linear Gradients (Both simple as well as multi-stop gradients work as long as they're horizontal or vertical)
  4. Text (Only one style per text element supported)
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma elements into osu!framework snippets

plugins.name: Badenova Design System Sync
plugins.description:
This plugin synchronizes your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System


Usage:

You need to provide a valid GitHub token to synchronize your Figma tokens.

To obtain a GitHub token, contact christoph.hummel@badenova.de or generate your own token.


If you have a valid GitHub token, enter it into the respective input field and press Save.

Then, click the Sync Badenova Design-Tokens button.

If the synchronization is successful, you will receive a confirmation message.
plugins.tagline: Synchronize your Figma tokens with the Badenova Design System

plugins.name: frameToGroup
plugins.description:
frameToGroup converts frames into organised groups while retaining essential visual properties.


✨ Key Features

✅ Effortless Conversion – Convert frames into neatly structured groups while keeping fills, strokes, and effects intact.

✅ Nested Frame Handling – Automatically processes nested frames for a well-organised layer structure.

✅ Style Preservation – Retains local styles and effects using asynchronous processing.

✅ User-Friendly UI – Simple, intuitive interface with one-click conversion.

✅ Continuous Workflow – Keep the plugin open for multiple conversions without interruptions.


✨ How to Use

  1. Select the frames you wish to convert in your Figma document.
  2. Click "Convert Frames to Groups" in the plugin UI.
plugins.tagline: Convert Frames to Groups While Retaining Styles

plugins.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer
plugins.description:
Introduction

This Figma plugin allows users to convert raster images into scalable vector graphics with a single click. Enhance your design process by transforming pixel-based images into smooth, resolution-independent vectors directly within Figma.


Function Description

  1. Vectorizes selected image nodes into SVG format.
  2. Preserves image structure and generates editable vector paths.
  3. Outputs scalable vector graphics compatible with Figma’s design tools.


How to Use

  1. Select an image node on your Figma canvas.
  2. Click the “Vectorize Image” button in the plugin UI.
  3. The plugin will generate an SVG vector output placed adjacent to the original image node.


Notes

  1. Ensure only one image node is selected before using the plugin.
  2. Only image nodes are supported for vectorization. Non-image nodes will not be processed.
  3. Large images may take additional time for processing.


介绍

此 Figma 插件支持一键将光栅图像转换为可缩放的矢量图形，让您在 Figma 内直接将像素图转换为平滑的、分辨率无关的矢量图，从而提升设计流程。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的图像节点矢量化为 SVG 格式。
  2. 保留图像结构，生成可编辑的矢量路径。
  3. 输出的矢量图与 Figma 的设计工具兼容。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 画布上选择一个图像节点。
  2. 点击插件界面的“矢量化图像”按钮。
  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Convert Images to Vectors Seamlessly

138820.name: 图像矢量化 Image Tracer

  3. 插件将在原始图像节点旁生成一个 SVG 矢量输出。


注意事项

  1. 请确保使用插件前只选中了一个图像节点。
  2. 仅支持对图像节点进行矢量化，非图像节点将无法处理。
  3. 对于较大的图像，处理时间可能会稍长。
138820.release_notes: Supports color vectorization with automatic extraction of dominant image colors for colorful SVG output.

plugins.name: 一键翻译元素 Quick Translate
plugins.description:
Introduction

Quick Translate is a Figma plugin designed to help you instantly translate selected text elements into different languages with just one click. Save time and improve your workflow by translating text directly within your design files.


Function Description

  1. Translate selected text elements into a specified target language.
  2. Supports multiple languages and automatic translation of all text layers in a Figma selection.
  3. Easy-to-use interface to select languages and apply translations quickly.
  4. Ideal for designers working on multilingual projects or collaborating with global teams.


How to Use

  1. Select one or more text elements in your Figma file.
  2. Open the plugin from the "Plugins" menu.
  3. Choose the target language for translation.
  4. Click the "Translate" button, and the selected text will be replaced with the translated version.


Notes

  1. Ensure your Figma selection includes text elements, as the plugin only works with text layers.
  2. The translation may vary depending on the accuracy of the API and the language selected.
  3. For optimal results, select only relevant text elements to avoid unnecessary API calls.


介绍

Quick Translate 是一款 Figma 插件，旨在帮助您一键翻译选中的文本元素。通过该插件，您可以直接在 Figma 文件中将文本翻译为不同语言，节省时间，提高工作效率。


功能说明

  1. 将选中的文本元素翻译为指定的目标语言。
  2. 支持多种语言，并自动翻译 Figma 选择中的所有文本图层。
  3. 提供简单易用的界面，可以快速选择语言并应用翻译。
  4. 适用于多语言项目的设计师，或者与全球团队协作的设计师。


使用方法

  1. 在 Figma 文件中选择一个或多个文本元素。
  2. 从“插件”菜单打开插件。
  3. 选择目标翻译语言。
  4. 点击“翻译”按钮，选中的文本将被翻译并替换。


注意事项

  1. 请确保您的 Figma 选择包含文本元素，因为插件只支持文本图层。
  2. 翻译效果可能会根据 API 的准确性和所选语言有所不同。
  3. 为了获得最佳效果，建议只选择相关的文本元素，以避免不必要的 API 请求。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: Quick Translate: Instant Translation for Figma Elements

plugins.name: 画板json导出(专业版) Export Frame JSON Pro
plugins.description:
Introduction

This plugin is designed to help users export detailed JSON data of selected nodes, including auto layout information, Frame nesting relationships, text properties, and more. With this plugin, users can easily retrieve structured data from design elements, facilitating data analysis, secondary development, or documentation.


功能

  1. Export complete JSON data of selected nodes, including properties like type, name, size, position, fills, strokes, and more.
  2. Support exporting text content, font name, font size, and other properties of text nodes.
  3. Support nested export of nodes such as Frame, Group, Component, and Instance, preserving the full hierarchical structure.
  4. Complete export of auto layout information, including layout mode, primary and secondary axis alignment, padding, and spacing.
  5. Safely serialized JSON data export ensures compatibility and completeness.


Usage Instructions

  1. Select one or more nodes from which you want to export data.
  2. Click the export button in the plugin, and the plugin will automatically extract all relevant information from the selected nodes and generate JSON data.
  3. The exported JSON data will be displayed in the plugin interface, allowing users to copy or download it for further use.


Notes

  1. This plugin currently supports exporting properties of common node types such as Frame.
  2. Ensure that the selected node types are supported by the plugin; otherwise, related data might not be exportable.
  3. If errors occur during the export process, check whether the nodes contain excessive nesting or complex properties. Simplify the structure if needed and try again.


简介

本插件旨在帮助用户导出选定节点的详细 JSON 数据，包括节点的自动布局信息、Frame 嵌套关系、文本属性等。通过此插件，用户可以轻松地获取设计元素的结构化数据，便于进行数据分析、二次开发或文档记录。


功能

  1. 导出选定节点的完整 JSON 数据，包括节点的类型、名称、尺寸、位置、填充、边框等属性。
  2. 支持导出文本节点的文本内容、字体名称、字号等属性。
  3. 支持 Frame、Group、Component、Instance 等节点类型的嵌套导出，保留完整的层次结构。
  4. 自动布局信息的完整导出，包括布局模式、主次轴对齐方式、填充和间距等。
  5. 导出的 JSON 数据经过安全序列化，确保兼容性和完整性。


使用说明

  1. 选中一个或多个需要导出数据的节点。
  2. 在插件中点击导出按钮，插件将自动提取选定节点的所有相关信息并生成 JSON 数据。
  3. 导出的 JSON 数据将会显示在插件界面中，用户可以复制或下载该数据用于其他用途。


注意事项

  1. 本插件目前只支持导出 Frame节点类型的属性。
  2. 请确保选定的节点类型受插件支持，否则可能无法导出相关数据。
  3. 如果导出过程中出现错误，请检查节点是否包含过多层次的嵌套或复杂的属性，建议简化结构后再试。

accepted.name: KingweiCheung
accepted.description: If you have any questions or suggestions, feel free to contact me at kingweichueng@qq.com.

plugins.tagline: The plugin quickly exports selected frame JSON data from Figma for other uses.

plugins.name: Token Exporter
plugins.description:
Token Exporter is a simple, powerful plugin that automates the export of your Figma variables, including colors, typography, spacing, and numbers—into production-ready code for multiple platforms.


It's a zero-config alternative to complex build tools, designed to make your design-to-development workflow seamless, fast, and error-free.



Benefits

  1. A Zero-Config Alternative to Style Dictionary: Get the power of a token transformation pipeline without the complex setup. Token Exporter works instantly from within the Figma UI.
  2. Instantly Usable: Works out of the box with zero configuration required.
  3. Save Hours of Work: Automate tedious token conversion and focus on what matters.
  4. Eliminate Errors: Ensure perfect accuracy from design to code, every time.
  5. Actively Developed: Continuously updated with new features and improvements.


Supported Export Formats


Swift (iOS Development)

import UIKit

struct AppTokens {
// MARK: - Colors
static let colorPrimary = UIColor(red: 0.067, green: 0.533, blue: 0.933, alpha: 1.0)
// MARK: - Sizing
static let sizeFontBody: CGFloat = 16
static let sizeSpacingMedium: CGFloat = 12
}


Android (XML)

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<resources>
<!-- Colors -->
<color name="color_primary">#1188EE</color>
<!-- Dimensions -->
<dimen name="size_font_body">16sp</dimen>
<dimen name="size_spacing_medium">12dp</dimen>
</resources>


Flutter (Dart)

import 'package:flutter/material.dart';

class AppTokens {
AppTokens._();

// --- Colors ---
static const Color colorPrimary = Color(0xFF1188EE);
// --- Sizing ---
static const double sizeFontBody = 16.0;
static const double sizeSpacingMedium = 12.0;
}


CSS (Custom Properties)

:root {
/* Colors */
--color-primary: #1188EE;
/* Sizing */
--size-font-body: 16px;
--size-spacing-medium: 12px;
}


JSON (W3C Standard)

{
"token": {
"color": {
"primary": {
"$type": "color",
"$value": "#1188EE"
}
},
"size": {
"font-body": {
"$type": "dimension",
"$value": "16px"
},
"spacing-medium": {
"$type": "dimension",
"$value": "12px"
}
}
}
}


Tailwind CSS (JavaScript)

module.exports = {
theme: {
extend: {
colors: {
'primary': '#1188EE'
},
spacing: {
'medium': '12px'
},
fontSize: {
'body': '16px'
}
}
}
}





How to Use

  1. Organize Your Variables: Ensure your design tokens (colors, numbers, strings) are organized in Figma variable collections.
  2. Launch the Plugin: Open Token Exporter. It will automatically detect and display your collections.
  3. Filter Token Types: Use the toggles to select which token types you want to export (Colors, Typography, Spacing, etc.).
  4. Select Collections: Choose which variable collections you want to include.
  5. Choose Formats: Select one or more export formats.
  6. Generate Your Tokens: Click "Generate Tokens" to get your perfectly formatted files.



--------------------------------------------------


Support & Feedback

Having issues or suggestions for improvement?

We'd love to hear from you!


❖ Send me an email

❖ Visit my Website

❖ Connect on LinkedIn
plugins.tagline: Export Figma variables to code for any platform.

plugins.name: Controlled Chaos Generator
plugins.description:
Controlled Chaos is a creative plugin for Figma that lets you generate multiple layout variations from a single frame using randomized component variants and layout rules.


Ideal for generative design workflows, creative exploration, and visual prototyping, the plugin allows you to:


Randomize Variants and Modes within a component set


Generate layout variations based on predefined rules


Choose your level of chaos, from subtle to extreme


Preserve your original design by generating new instances


Whether you're designing posters, exploring compositions, or creating a system for generative art, Controlled Chaos gives you the power to balance consistency with surprise.


How to use it

Select a frame that contains components with variants (e.g. posters, cards, layouts…).


In the plugin UI, choose your Chaos Level:

Low: subtle and controlled changes

Medium: a balance between order and randomness

High: full chaos, maximum variation


(Optional) Enable Layout Chaos to also randomize the size and layout properties of elements.


Click “Generate chaos”. The plugin will create a duplicate of your selected frame, with randomized variants and layout — your original design stays untouched.
plugins.tagline: Variants & layout randomizer

140231.description:

Whether you're designing posters, exploring compositions, or creating a system for generative art, Controlled Chaos gives you the power to balance consistency with surprise.

plugins.name: webpix
plugins.description: WebPix is your all-in-one solution for exporting multiple Figma frames or images in the highly optimized .webP format—tailored for both designers and developers building for Web and Android. With seamless resolution controls, customizable naming schemes, and flexible folder structuring, WebPix simplifies your export workflow while preserving quality and reducing file sizes.
plugins.tagline: Smarter .webP Exports for Design & Dev Precision

140095.name: webpix
140095.description: WebPix is your all-in-one solution for exporting multiple Figma frames or images in the highly optimized .webP format—tailored for both designers and developers building for Web and Android. With seamless resolution controls, customizable naming schemes, and flexible folder structuring, WebPix simplifies your export workflow while preserving quality and reducing file sizes.
140095.tagline: Smarter .webP Exports for Design & Dev Precision

plugins.name: Variably
plugins.description:
Visualize your Figma Variables in a clean, structured table


This plugin transforms your Figma variables collections into structured, visual tables directly on your canvas. Whether you're documenting design tokens, creating handoff materials, or maintaining a design system, it automatically generates professional tables with proper grouping, color indicators, and CSS-ready dev tokens.


  1. Auto-detect and group variables by prefixes
  2. Generate CSS custom properties for developers
  3. Visual color swatches for color variables
  4. Support for all Figma variable types (Color, Number, String, Boolean)
  5. Handle multiple modes/themes seamlessly
  6. Smart alias resolution and formatting


Clean. Structured. Ready for handoff. All variables stay perfectly in sync with your design system.

accepted.name: Pavel Grachev
accepted.description: Product designer. Focused on clarity, usability, and quality design systems.

plugins.tagline: Visualize your Figma Variables in a clean, structured table

140071.name: Variably
140071.description:
Visualize your Figma Variables in a clean, structured table


This plugin transforms your Figma variables collections into structured, visual tables directly on your canvas. Whether you're documenting design tokens, creating handoff materials, or maintaining a design system, it automatically generates professional tables with proper grouping, color indicators, and CSS-ready dev tokens.


  1. Auto-detect and group variables by prefixes
  2. Generate CSS custom properties for developers
  3. Visual color swatches for color variables
  4. Support for all Figma variable types (Color, Number, String, Boolean)
  5. Handle multiple modes/themes seamlessly
  6. Smart alias resolution and formatting


Clean. Structured. Ready for handoff. All variables stay perfectly in sync with your design system.
140071.release_notes: Refactor variable table creation to unify themes into a single table layout; enhance group separation and styling; update related functions for improved parameter handling. Update tab icons for better visual representation.
140071.tagline: Visualize your Figma Variables in a clean, structured table

plugins.name: Gradient Playground
plugins.description: Gradient Studio Pro is the ultimate Figma plugin for creating, customizing, and exporting stunning gradients in seconds. Choose from 100+ professionally designed gradient presets, explore multiple gradient types (linear, radial, mesh, angular, diamond), apply blend modes and noise effects, and export ready-to-use CSS & SVG code — all in one intuitive interface. Whether you're a UI/UX designer or front-end developer, Gradient Studio Pro helps you design modern, vibrant, and responsive color flows effortlessly.
plugins.tagline: Elevate Your UI with 1-Click Gradients – A Must-Have Figma Plugin

plugins.name: Not a Linker
plugins.description:
[Ru]

Not a Linker — это умный плагин для быстрого копирования ссылок на фреймы и секции в Figma с поддержкой кликабельных ссылок.


🎯 КЛЮЧЕВЫЕ ВОЗМОЖНОСТИ:

  1. Умное копирование — HTML + обычный текст для максимальной совместимости
  2. Кликабельные ссылки — работают в Telegram, Slack и других приложениях
  3. 9 языков — автоматическое определение языка браузера
  4. Мгновенная работа — выбрал фреймы → один клик → готово
  5. Универсальность — работает с фреймами и секциями
  6. Компактный интерфейс — не отвлекает от работы


🚀 КАК РАБОТАЕТ:

  1. Выберите фреймы или секции
  2. Запустите плагин → "Copy and Close"
  3. Вставляйте кликабельные ссылки где угодно


📋 ФОРМАТ ВЫВОДА:

Название фрейма
https://www.figma.com/file/...
--
Другой фрейм
https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 ЯЗЫКИ: English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文

📱 СОВМЕСТИМОСТЬ: Telegram, Slack, Notes, Word, Notion, Confluence и любые текстовые редакторы


Идеально для дизайнеров, которые часто делятся ссылками на конкретные фреймы. Экономьте время и работайте эффективнее!


[En]

Not a Linker is a smart plugin for quickly copying frame and section links in Figma with clickable link support.


🎯 KEY FEATURES:

  1. Smart copying — HTML + plain text for maximum compatibility
  2. Clickable links — work in Telegram, Slack, and other apps
  3. 9 languages — automatic browser language detection
  4. Instant workflow — select frames → one click → done
  5. Universal — works with both frames and sections
  6. Compact interface — doesn't distract from your work


🚀 HOW IT WORKS:

  1. Select frames or sections
  2. Run plugin → "Copy and Close"
  3. Paste clickable links anywhere


📋 OUTPUT FORMAT:

Frame Name
https://www.figma.com/file/...
--
Another Frame
https://www.figma.com/file/...


🌍 LANGUAGES: English, Русский, Deutsch, Français, Español, Português, 日本語, 한국어, 中文

📱 COMPATIBILITY: Telegram, Slack, Notes, Word, Notion, Confluence, and any text editors


Perfect for designers who frequently share links to specific frames. Save time and work more efficiently!
plugins.tagline: Quickly copy frame and section links with automatic multilingual support

plugins.name: Clean frame numbers
plugins.description:
Do you have Frame 239659303 names around your figma file? Then this plugin is made to clean it up.


This is NOT to rename the numbers, it's to clean up the numbers.

Note: if your file is huge, then go ahead and put on some coffee.

plugins.name: Token Exporter Pro
plugins.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
plugins.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

138641.name: Token Exporter Pro
138641.description:
Export Figma color, gradient, and shadow tokens with one click — no fluff, just clean, dev-ready output.


Choose your naming convention (camelCase, PascalCase, dot.notation…), match your framework (React, Tailwind, or plain CSS), and get tokens you can actually use.


Includes:

✅ Linear & radial gradients (with angles)

✅ Shadow exports (drop & inner)

✅ Format-ready for Tailwind, JSON, and SCSS

✅ Works great with Style Dictionary or custom configs


Perfect for design system handoffs, developer styling, and anyone who’s tired of manually formatting hex codes.
138641.release_notes: Added "documentAccess": "read" to support newer Figma permissions
138641.tagline: Export design tokens from Figma — with naming styles, framework formats, gradients & shadows.

plugins.name: Invoicely
plugins.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.

accepted.name: Diego Grillo
accepted.description:
I like building things that people use.
Mostly simple, useful, sometimes weird.
Currently shipping plugins, tools & ideas.

plugins.tagline: Quick Invoice Maker for Figma

137998.name: Invoicely
137998.description:
Create clean, professional invoices directly inside Figma — no extra tools needed.


Invoicely lets freelancers, designers, and agencies generate stylish invoices in seconds with pre-built templates, client autofill.


✦ Select a template

✦ Add your client and items

✦ Hit “Generate Invoice” — done.


Built for speed. Designed for simplicity.
137998.release_notes:
This is the first public release of Invoicely.

✔️ All core features are working:

Template selection

Client & sender input

Tax customization

Instant invoice generation

Fully editable directly in Figma

⚠️ Minor note:
Some alignments in the invoice template aren’t pixel-perfect yet.
We wanted to ship early and improve fast — updates are already planned to polish everything.

Stay tuned for more features and improvements coming soon!

plugins.name: Grammar AI
plugins.description:
🔧 Grammar AI – Smart Grammar Fixer for Figma Designers ✨

Fix grammar issues in your selected text with the power of AI 🧠✍️. No more switching apps—Grammar AI reviews and corrects spelling, grammar, and clarity instantly inside Figma.


✅ One-click grammar fixes

📚 AI-powered rewriting suggestions

🎨 Seamless Figma integration

⚡ Perfect for UI/UX copy, product text, and microcopy


Make your designs not just beautiful—but perfectly written. 💬✨

accepted.name: sadik sajid
accepted.description: Hi, I'm sadik sajid — a passionate designer crafting intuitive and visually engaging digital experiences. I specialize in user interfaces, design systems

plugins.tagline: AI-powered grammar fixer for flawless Figma text—write smart, design sharper.

Select one or more text layers


Instantly fill them with Lorem Ipsum

Lightweight and super fast

plugins.name: Color Combo
plugins.description:
This Figma plugin enables direct testing of color combinations in your design file. This allows the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō to be integrated into modern digital design processes without intermediate steps.


Steps

  1. Open the Color Combo plugin
  2. Select two color styles from the dropdown (or add new ones)
  3. Apply these color styles to your design elements (frames, text, etc.)
  4. Choose a color combination: Click any combination preview, or hit Random for instant variety Toggle Muted colors for subtle palettes
plugins.tagline: Bringing the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō (1883–1967) to your digital workflow.

136936.name: Color Combo
136936.description:
This Figma plugin enables direct testing of color combinations in your design file. This allows the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō to be integrated into modern digital design processes without intermediate steps.


Steps

  1. Open the Color Combo plugin
  2. Select two color styles from the dropdown (or add new ones)
  3. Apply these color styles to your design elements (frames, text, etc.)
  4. Choose a color combination: Click any combination preview, or hit Random for instant variety Toggle Muted colors for subtle palettes
136936.release_notes:
Resolved unhandled promise rejection errors that occurred when using the plugin in Figma
Fixed plugin initialization issues related to dynamic page access
Improved error handling for style retrieval operations
136936.tagline: Bringing the timeless color harmonies of Wada Sanzō (1883–1967) to your digital workflow.

plugins.name: Tint & Shade Generator
plugins.description:
Quickly generate a color palette from any given color directly inside Figma. Choose how many shades and tints you'd like to generate — the plugin dynamically creates balanced variations optimized for both light and dark mode interfaces.


Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
plugins.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.

Each color swatch is clearly labeled for readability. Perfect for building design systems, theming user interfaces, or exploring creative color variations.


Simple, clean, and efficient — made for everyday design workflows.
137104.tagline: Generate a full color palette from any color with clear labels, supporting light and dark modes.
